entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Port Perry
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:07 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.7°C

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this morning then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h early this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
